Readable Body Text

Pagination only works on posts, not on categories of posts. I handled this by displaying all posts including portfolio plices in my blog. Portfolio pieces are displayed on a portfolio page that doesn't use pagination. It simply looks for all itemms with a YAML front matter label of highlight true. It diesplays only these items. Then I put the full bunch on a different page without paginations.
